titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2193), a bill to grant States authority to enforce State and local sales and use tax laws on remote transactions, and for other purposes.
Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2193), a bill to grant States authority to enforce State and local sales and use tax laws on remote transactions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 2193 (Remote Transactions Parity Act of 2017).
